Description:
Detects process connections to a Monero crypto mining pool

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Linux Crypto Mining Pool Connections
Query: sourcetype="linux-*" (dst_host="pool.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="fr.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="de.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="sg.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="ca.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="us-west.minexmr.com" OR dst_host="pool.supportxmr.com" OR dst_host="mine.c3pool.com" OR dst_host="xmr-eu1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-eu2.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-us-east1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-us-west1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-asia1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-jp1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr-au1.nanopool.org" OR dst_host="xmr.2miners.com" OR dst_host="xmr.hashcity.org" OR dst_host="xmr.f2pool.com" OR dst_host="xmrpool.eu" OR dst_host="pool.hashvault.pro" OR dst_host="moneroocean.stream" OR dst_host="monerocean.stream")
